SELECT a.ID id,DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s') createTime,d.ADDRESS_INFO address, a.STATUS status, COALESCE(a.TOTAL_PRICE,0.00) totalPrice, COALESCE(e.BALANCE,0.00) balancePrice, d.ZIPCODE zipcode, d.GET_NAME getName, d.PHONE phone, c.ID box_id,c.NAME name, c.TITLE title,c.DETAIL detail, COALESCE(c.BOX_PRICE,0.00) price, b.ORDER_WAY orderWay, CONCAT('${url}',CASE WHEN c.IMAGE_ADDRESS IS NOT NULL THEN REPLACE(c.IMAGE_ADDRESS,'\\','/') END) imageAddress, COALESCE(b.ORDER_COUNT,0) orderCount, COALESCE(b.SEND_COUNT,0) sendCount, b.status boxStatus, b.send_status sendStatus FROM orders a LEFT JOIN ORDER_BOX_REF b ON a.ID = b.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN BOX c ON c.ID = b.BOX_ID LEFT JOIN ADDRESS d ON a.ADDRESS_ID = d.ID LEFT JOIN USER e on a.user_id = e.id WHERE a.USER_ID = #{userid}
AND b.SEND_STATUS = #{status}
